title: Morningstars
content:
HeartstopperConcussive Smash

Special Properties

Weapon Enchantment +1

Tenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Dawnburst Strike: Deal additional Radiant damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus. On a hit, light erupts around you in an area. Enemies in the light must succeed a DC 13 Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded.

Ravengard's Scourger

Weapon Enchantment +1

Commander's Strike: Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally uses a
